channel.title: PI player attacks back no matter WHAT HELP OGSEGSESFSEF
channel.description: Bascially, whenever someone attacks me, I ALWAYS attack back. I removed auto retaliate and it still happends?

item.title: PI player attacks back no matter WHAT HELP OGSEGSESFSEF
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Your auto retaliate variable is most likely still set in the responsive attack mode even though you removed the action button. Change its value to 0 or false depending on how your server handles it.

Read full topic
